title: FT: Two Chance Yellow Portrait EPDG’s - SGC 30 and PSA 4 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Two Chance Yellow Portrait EPDG’s - SGC 30 and PSA 4 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Cards Sold!

I have 2, but only need to keep 1.  Going to be a tough find but looking to trade for one of these EPDG’s in similar condition.

[STRIKE]Chance Batting[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Chance Red Portrait[/STRIKE]
Keeler with Bat
Tinker Bat Off
Wheat

Asking $SOLD for the SGC 30 and $SOLD for the PSA 4

[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1863/42470329650_11c7a7dae0.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1853/29342269367_04fe93b8ac.jpg[/IMG]

PSA 4 - Please note the mark under baseball and the bottom left edge of the card are from the scan. Card is clean.
[IMG]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4893/45469830384_4eb7786ff6_b.jpg[/IMG]
If you have no luck in trade ,I would be interested in a purchase....lmk. I have 4 different Chance port with diferent back this would gimme 5. If not no biggie and good luck

Picked up a Chance Red Portrait.......

Anyone got one of these for trade?

Bump for the month!  Picked up a beater Chance batting but still looking to close the gap!
Bump! Accepting cash offers for either. If one sells, the other is off the market. Added a more detailed scan of the PSA 4
Added prices!  Still interested in trading preferably.
